What is the outlook for Parry-Romberg ?,"The prognosis for individuals with Parry-Romberg syndrome varies. In some cases, the atrophy ends before the entire face is affected. In mild cases, the disorder usually causes no disability other than cosmetic effects.",NINDS,Parry-Romberg
what research (or clinical trials) is being done for Parry-Romberg ?,"The NINDS supports research on neurological disorders such as Par
